info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 12:40PM EDT by NWS Louisville KY
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...
Ohio River at McAlpine Lower affecting Hardin, Floyd, Meade, Harrison, Jefferson and Clark Counties.
Ohio River at Cannelton Lock and Dam affecting Hancock, Breckinridge, Perry and Crawford Counties.
Ohio River at Clifty Creek affecting Jefferson and Trimble Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...
Ohio River at McAlpine Upper affecting Jefferson, Clark, Floyd and Oldham Counties.
Ohio River at Tell City affecting Hancock and Perry Counties.
.Heavy rain from the past several days has caused the river to rise with additional rainfall expected through Sunday.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at McAlpine Upper.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Some sections of River Road are closed from 3rd St. to 8th St. Eifler Beach and Juniper Beach areas are cut off. Parts of Campbell St., Frankfort Ave., and Mockingbird Valley Rd. close. Right turns onto River Rd. from the I-64 ramp are prohibited. At 34.0 feet, Bingham Way is closed at floodgate. Water floods East Riverside Road near Fisherman's Wharf in Jeffersonville. At 36.0 feet, 11th Street is closed at floodgates.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 22.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.6 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.7 feet on 02/26/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk.
The next statement will be issued by Sunday afternoon at 200 PM EDT /100 PM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Clark, IN; Floyd, IN; Jefferson, KY; Oldham, KY
